participant_1.background:
I like to dress up to impress, but comfort is the key to my happiness.
I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me.
My pets love to swim in the lake in my backyard.
i am an award winning th member.
i eat a lot of fish.

participant_2.background:
I have a very busy schedule, so I usually do laundry once a week.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
i love lasagna like i am garfield.
I lost my childhood dog when I was 10.

content.text: I'm doing great! What about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I just got done with a run and now I'm drinking some chai tea.
Oh, that sounds refreshing! I love chai tea!
Me too! It's so delicious. What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out with my pets. They love to swim in the lake in my backyard.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love swimming. I used to do gymnastics, but I can't do it anymore because I'm blind.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that! But I'm sure you're still very active.
Yeah, I still run and do other things. I just can't do gymnastics anymore.
That's good to hear! What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to read and write. I'm also an award-winning TH member!
Oh, that's awesome! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love a lot of different books, but I really like historical fiction and mystery novels.
Those are great genres! I love historical fiction too. What's your favorite historical fiction book?
That's a hard question! I have so many favorites. But I think I would have to say A Thousand Splendid Suns by Khaled Hosseini.
That's a great book! I loved it too. I'm glad we have so much in common
